title: Francesco Lorenzon
text:
Francesco Lorenzon (born 3 April 1991) is an Italian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who currently plays for <a href="A.C.%20Cuneo%201905">Cuneo</a>.
Appearances on Italian Series.
<a href="Serie%20C1">Serie C1</a> : 1 app
Total : 1 app
